form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to designate the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Cyber Policy as principal staff assistant to the Secretary of Defense on matters within the responsibility of the Assistant Secretary, and for other purposes.

section.header: Designation of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Cyber Policy as principal staff assistant
section.text: Section 138(b)(8) of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting (A) before the first sentence; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: Subject to the authority, direction, and control of the Secretary of Defense, the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Cyber Policy—

clause.text: shall serve as a principal staff assistant to the Secretary of Defense on matters within the responsibility of the Assistant Secretary;
shall report directly to the Secretary without intervening authority; and

may communicate views on matters within the responsibility of the Assistant Secretary directly to the Secretary without obtaining the approval or concurrence of any other official within the Department of Defense.
